question:
Consider the following countries:
  1. Canada
  2. Australia
  3. Brazil
  4. Indonesia
Which of the above are larger than India in terms of geographical area?
explanation: In terms of area, India ranks seventh in the world after Russia, Canada, US, China, Australia and Brazil. The areas of the above given countries are as follows: Canada (9,984,670 Square kilometres), Australia (7,692,024 Square kilometres), Brazil (8,515,767 Square kilometres), Indonesia (1,904,556 Square kilometres) and India (3,287,263 Square kilometres).
